data.apiNameCn: 国内按航段变更费计算（新版）
data.introduce: 国内按航段变更费计算（AirRepriceBySeg）为用户提供了基于航段信息组的国内变更价查询服务。
data.business: 国内单程、联程等类型的变更价计算。
data.functions:
支持改期及换开的变更费计算
支持对国内Reshop结果进行验价
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirRepriceBySegRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内按航段变更费计算请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"销售点信息：POS信息涉及到用户后台指定 的访问授权，用户所在的销售 地点，用户缺省使用的航空公 司等信息。","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"airlinecode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"换开航司：发起换开请求的换开航空公司代码：如果为航空公司网站（包括B2B/B2C/B2G），则由网站提供此航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"iatacode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Iata号","children":[]},{"name":"CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市代码","children":[]},{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PCC：代理人office号，如PEK099","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"RePriceBySegInfos","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行程信息","children":[{"name":"RePriceBySegInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退改签明细","children":[{"name":"FlightSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行程信息","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"operationCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"实际承运航空公司两字码，例：CA","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：MU）","children":[]}]},{"name":"departure","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"起飞机场三字码","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码：机场代码（例如：PEK）","children":[]}]},{"name":"arrival","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达机场三字码","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"equipment","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机型","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"飞机型号","children":[]},{"name":"@ChangeofGauge","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否换过飞机","children":[]}]},{"name":"marketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司两字码","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"flightno","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"departureTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班起飞时间","children":[]},{"name":"arrivalTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达时间","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段类型，使用常量 RCReq_NewSegment.AIRSEG_ARNK RCReq_NewSegment.AIRSEG_NORMAL RCReq_NewSegment.AIRSEG_OPEN","children":[]},{"name":"actionCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行动代码","children":[]},{"name":"cabin","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"仓位","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketNumber_Before","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旧票号：13 位校验，可以带“-”","children":[]},{"name":"PayType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"支付方式(支持CC/CASH)","children":[]},{"name":"IsInfant","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否是婴儿","children":[]},{"name":"PassName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"姓名","children":[]},{"name":"PassID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客序号，如P1","children":[]},{"name":"PassCount","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客数量","children":[]},{"name":"InvoluntaryIdentifier","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否是非自愿","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@SysType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"C","description":"系统类型:B,C","children":[]}]}]

[{"name":"TES_AirRepriceBySegRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内按航段变更费计算响应信息","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误附加信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误附加信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误英文信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误中文信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketChangerResponse","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Result","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"faretotal","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票面SFC 示信息","children":[]},{"name":"fn","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票面FN","children":[]},{"name":"fc","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票面FC：编号","children":[]},{"name":"fp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票面FP：支付方式为信用卡，不生成fp 价差：实际收取的票价差。缺省为0","children":[]},{"name":"taxdiff","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"实际收取税 差：实际收取的税差。","children":[]},{"name":"Totalfare","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"实际收取税

差","children":[]},{"name":"ticketFare","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票价","children":[]},{"name":"exchangeType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OI 自愿变更文本；N 不可变更；0-9自愿变更","children":[]},{"name":"errorCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误编码：实际返回的运价错误编号、中文、英文","children":[]},{"name":"textUnvoluntaryChangeRules","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票OT非自愿变更
                            文本查NFS_carrier.RULE_REISSUE 表时候查数据库返回的

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirRepriceBySegRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source>
            <airlinecode>CA</airlinecode>
            <iatacode>08385252</iatacode>
            <CityCode>BJS</CityCode>
            <PseudoCityCode>BJS187</PseudoCityCode>
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <RePriceBySegInfos>
        <RePriceBySegInfo>
            <FlightSegments>
                <!-- 新航段信息 -->
                <FlightSegment>
                    <departure LocationCode="PEK"/>
                    <arrival LocationCode="SHA"/>
                    <equipment AirEquipType="359"/>
                    <marketingCarrier Code="CA"/>
                    <operationCarrier Code="CA"/>
                    <departureTime>2022-10-25T07:30:00</departureTime>
                    <arrivalTime>2022-10-25T09:55:00</arrivalTime>
                    <type>NORMAL</type>
                    <flightno>CA1831</flightno>
                    <cabin>F</cabin>
                    <actionCode>HK</actionCode>
                </FlightSegment>
            </FlightSegments>
            <!-- 原票号 -->
            <TicketNumber_Before>999-6921928107</TicketNumber_Before>
            <IsInfant>false</IsInfant>
            <PassName>zhou/xiao</PassName>
            <InvoluntaryIdentifier>false</InvoluntaryIdentifier>
        </RePriceBySegInfo>
    </RePriceBySegInfos>
</TES_AirRepriceBySegRQ>
